mapper.select: SELECT enterprise_num, (month_income1 + month_income2) AS month_income, (year_income1 + year_income2) AS year_income, (all_income1 + all_income2) AS all_income FROM (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(DATEDIFF(NOW(), platform_pay_ok_datetime) < 30, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS month_income1, IFNULL(SUM(IF(DATEDIFF(NOW(), platform_pay_ok_datetime) < 365, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS year_income1, IFNULL(SUM(maker_net_income), 0) AS all_income1 FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = #{param1} AND (pay_state = 'PLATFORMPAID' OR pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAID')) t1, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(DATEDIFF(NOW(), create_time) < 30, charge_money_num, 0)), 0) AS month_income2, IFNULL(SUM(IF(DATEDIFF(NOW(), create_time) < 365, charge_money_num, 0)), 0) AS year_income2, IFNULL(SUM(charge_money_num), 0) AS all_income2 FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_detail WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = #{param1} AND (invoice_print_state = 'INVOICEING' OR invoice_print_state = 'INVOICESUCCESS')) t2, (SELECT COUNT(t1.id) AS enterprise_num FROM diyi_maker_enterprise t1 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.maker_id = #{param1} AND t1.relationship_type = 'RELEVANCE' AND t1.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING') t3

SELECT YEAR(platform_pay_ok_datetime) AS year, IFNULL(SUM(maker_net_income), 0) AS year_income FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (pay_state = 'PLATFORMPAID' OR pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAID') AND maker_type = #{param1} AND maker_id = #{param2} GROUP BY YEAR(platform_pay_ok_datetime)

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 1, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS jan_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 2, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS feb_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 3, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS mar_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 4, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS apr_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 5, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS may_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 6, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS jun_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 7, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS jul_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 8, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS aug_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 9, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS sep_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 10, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS oct_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 11, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS nov_income, IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = 12, maker_net_income, 0)), 0) AS dec_income FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (pay_state = 'PLATFORMPAID' OR pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAID') AND maker_type = #{param1} AND maker_id = #{param2} AND YEAR(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = #{param3}

SELECT t1.month_money + t2.month_money AS month_money, t1.year_money + t2.year_money AS year_money FROM (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = MONTH(NOW()), total_fee, 0)), 0) AS month_money, IFNULL(SUM(IF(YEAR(platform_pay_ok_datetime) = YEAR(NOW()), total_fee, 0)), 0) AS year_money FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (pay_state = 'PLATFORMPAID' OR pay_state = 'CONFIRMPAID') AND individual_id = #{param1} AND maker_type = #{param2}) t1, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(NOW()), charge_money_num, 0)), 0) AS month_money, IFNULL(SUM(IF(YEAR(create_time) = YEAR(NOW()), charge_money_num, 0)), 0) AS year_money FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_detail WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (invoice_print_state = 'INVOICEING' OR invoice_print_state = 'INVOICESUCCESS') AND individual_id = #{param1} AND maker_type = #{param2}) t2

SELECT t1.id, t2.name, t2.idcard_no, t1.maker_net_income, t1.maker_tax_fee, t1.audit_fee, t1.pay_fee, t1.total_fee, t1.service_rate FROM diyi_pay_maker t1 INNER JOIN diyi_maker t2 ON t1.maker_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND IF((SELECT accept_paysheet_type FROM diyi_accept_paysheet WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}) = 'SINGLE' , EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND pay_maker_id = t1.id), EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_list WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND accept_paysheet_id = #{param1} AND pay_maker_id = t1.id))

SELECT id, maker_type, maker_net_income, service_rate, maker_tax_fee, maker_ne_income, enterprise_business_annual_fee, audit_fee, pay_fee, total_fee, pay_state, maker_tax_state, maker_invoice_state, create_time, IF(maker_type = 'NATURALPERSON', '', IF(maker_type = 'INDIVIDUALENTERPRISE', (SELECT ibname FROM diyi_individual_enterprise WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = individual_id), (SELECT ibname FROM diyi_individual_business WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = individual_id))) AS individualName FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = #{param1}
SELECT id AS pay_maker_id, maker_id FROM diyi_pay_maker WHERE pay_state = 'PLATFORMPAID' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), platform_pay_ok_datetime) >= 7
